FuncDef: The reset cpu-usage record slave command line is used to clear statistics about the standby master's CPU usage in the device.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the user needs to know exactly how much CPU usage the device has had over a certain period of time, he can use this command to erase the historical CPU usage before statistics.
Execute the command reset cpu-usage record slave and the system will clear the CPU usage information on the standby master board.
